department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
### ACAN: Second-generation Smallpox Vaccine Tender Announcement
#### Reference Information
- **Solicitation Number (Numero de sollicitation)**: WS4220040030
- **Publication Date**: 2023-10-26
- **Tender Closing Date (Date de fermeture des offres)**: 2023-11-09T14:00:00
- **Tender Status (Statut de l'appel d'offres)**: Expired

#### Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids from qualified vendors to supply a Second-generation Smallpox Vaccine. The vaccine is intended for use by the Public Health Agency of Canada.

#### Trade Agreements (Accords commerciaux)
This tender is subject to the applicable trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* etc...

#### Regions of Opportunity (Regions d'opportunité)
This tender is open to all qualified vendors.

#### Delivery Regions (Régions de livraison)
The vaccine will be delivered to the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Contracting Entity (Entité contractante)
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Contact Information (Informations de contact)
- **Name**: Vettoretti, Eric (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: eric.vettoretti@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Phone**: None
- **Fax**: None
- **Attachments**: None
- **Tender Notice URL (Lien vers le billet d'information)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17835297?extsite=MTc4MzUyOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

I kept only relevant information to make sure all the details are displayed in a concise manner. I reformatted the entries to match a more professional formatting style. Let me know if you need any changes.



#### Acronyms

* ALECU: Accord de libre-échange Ukraine-Canada 
* ACAN: Advance Contract Award Notice
* PUR/TL: Public
